title: Pakistan approves military offensive against separatists in Balochistan
content: Pakistan is gearing up for a full-scale military operation in Balochistan to counter a surge in attacks on civilians and foreign nationals. The operation targets separatist groups, including the Majeed Brigade, BLA, BLF, and BRAS, who are accused of undermining Pakistan's security and economic progress at the behest of hostile foreign powers.
summary: Pakistan is gearing up for a full-scale military operation in Balochistan to counter a surge in attacks on civilians and foreign nationals. The operation targets separatist groups, including the Majeed Brigade, BLA, BLF, and BRAS, who are accused of undermining Pakistan's security and economic progress at the behest of hostile foreign powers.

title: Is Barron Trump not a US citizen under Donald's immigration plan? Claim viral on social media
content: Donald Trump's plan to end birthright citizenship will only affect children born to parents who are in the US illegally. If either of the parents is a green card holder, the child automatically becomes a US citizen. Fake claims are doing the rounds that Barron Trump is not a US citizen because Melania was not a US citizen when Barron was born. Melania was not an illegal immigrant and Donald Trump was a legal resident when Barron was born.
summary: Donald Trump's plan to end birthright citizenship will only affect children born to parents who are in the US illegally. If either of the parents is a green card holder, the child automatically becomes a US citizen. Fake claims are doing the rounds that Barron Trump is not a US citizen because Melania was not a US citizen when Barron was born. Melania was not an illegal immigrant and Donald Trump was a legal resident when Barron was born.

title: 'Hey Elon Musk, put me...': Dem commentator's post blows up as Trump's son replies
content: "Hey @elonmusk, put me in charge of the Pentagon. I'll slash $400B easy. That'll get you 20% to your goal of $2T, right out of the gate. I went to Wharton three years before you. I own a media company, so I know how to run a business. If you really want to cut, put me in, coach," Uygur wrote to Musk to which both Elon Musk and Donald Trump Jr replied.
summary: "Hey @elonmusk, put me in charge of the Pentagon. I'll slash $400B easy. That'll get you 20% to your goal of $2T, right out of the gate. I went to Wharton three years before you. I own a media company, so I know how to run a business. If you really want to cut, put me in, coach," Uygur wrote to Musk to which both Elon Musk and Donald Trump Jr replied.

title: When Pete Hegseth said he doesn't wash his hands because 'germs are not real thing'
content: The sexual misconduct allegation against Veteran, and former Fox News host Pete Hegseth has caught the Trump transition team off guard as they were not aware of it. Hegseth's lawyer said it was not misconduct but consensual but Hegseth was blackmailed into paying the accuser during the #MeToo movement. Trump team feels Hegseth has not been honest about his past.
summary: The sexual misconduct allegation against Veteran, and former Fox News host Pete Hegseth has caught the Trump transition team off guard as they were not aware of it. Hegseth's lawyer said it was not misconduct but consensual but Hegseth was blackmailed into paying the accuser during the #MeToo movement. Trump team feels Hegseth has not been honest about his past.

title: 'Elon is Trump's closest, there's no close second': Mar-a-Lago insiders after clash report
content: Since the Election Night, Musk and Trump have been almost inseparable. In the first week, Musk was seen at Mar-a-Lago every day. Then he was announced as the co-chief of DOGE. Musk went to Madison Square Garden with Trump at the UFC. Then Trump flew to Texas to watch the test launch of Musk's starship rocket.
summary: Since the Election Night, Musk and Trump have been almost inseparable. In the first week, Musk was seen at Mar-a-Lago every day. Then he was announced as the co-chief of DOGE. Musk went to Madison Square Garden with Trump at the UFC. Then Trump flew to Texas to watch the test launch of Musk's starship rocket.

title: Lauren Sanchez reveals planning for wedding to Jeff Bezos this Christmas: 'So you asked...'
content: "I'm getting to it right now," Lauren Sanchez said about the wedding planning. "Very excited about it. Thinking about the dress, I have to say. I do have a Pinterest, I'm just like every other bride. So I do have a Pinterest board." Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez will get married in an extravagant affair with the couple's A-list friends this Christmas in Aspen, Colorado.
summary: "I'm getting to it right now," Lauren Sanchez said about the wedding planning. "Very excited about it. Thinking about the dress, I have to say. I do have a Pinterest, I'm just like every other bride. So I do have a Pinterest board." Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez will get married in an extravagant affair with the couple's A-list friends this Christmas in Aspen, Colorado.

title: Barron Trump's viral briefcase of 'I like my suitcase' video: Details, price
content: According to reports, that suitcase that Barron said he liked was not just any suitcase but a Louis Vuitton briefcase that now sells for almost $10,000, Daily Mail reported. The video was filmed for Larry King Live in 2010 showing Melania and Barron hanging out at Donald Trump's office. People are making videos using Barron's childhood voice saying: 'I like my suitcase."
summary: According to reports, that suitcase that Barron said he liked was not just any suitcase but a Louis Vuitton briefcase that now sells for almost $10,000, Daily Mail reported. The video was filmed for Larry King Live in 2010 showing Melania and Barron hanging out at Donald Trump's office. People are making videos using Barron's childhood voice saying: 'I like my suitcase."

title: Capitol Transgender Row: Nancy Mace doubles down, says ‘no p**** in female locker rooms’
content: Mace’s resolution explicitly seeks to prohibit members, staff, and employees of the House from using single-sex facilities—such as bathrooms, locker rooms, and changing areas—that do not align with their biological sex. This initiative, framed as a matter of privacy and safety, has been interpreted by many as a direct response to McBride's historic election. Mace has been unflinching in her rhetoric, making remarks about biological men in women’s spaces and even referring to McBride with dismissive language.
summary: Mace’s resolution explicitly seeks to prohibit members, staff, and employees of the House from using single-sex facilities—such as bathrooms, locker rooms, and changing areas—that do not align with their biological sex. This initiative, framed as a matter of privacy and safety, has been interpreted by many as a direct response to McBride's historic election. Mace has been unflinching in her rhetoric, making remarks about biological men in women’s spaces and even referring to McBride with dismissive language.

title: Does Linda McMahon have no degree in education? Here's what we know
content: Viral posts on social media claimed Linda McMahon has no degree and married Vince just after high school. They got married when Linda was 17 and Vince was 21. According to reports, Linda enrolled at East Carolina University in 1966 where she obtained a bachelor's degree in French and was certified to teach.
summary: Viral posts on social media claimed Linda McMahon has no degree and married Vince just after high school. They got married when Linda was 17 and Vince was 21. According to reports, Linda enrolled at East Carolina University in 1966 where she obtained a bachelor's degree in French and was certified to teach.

title: China ship stirs suspicions after key Baltic Sea cables damaged
content: Two undersea data cables in the Baltic Sea connecting Finland, Germany, Lithuania, and Sweden were damaged. The Danish military is investigating a Chinese ship, Yi Peng 3, that was near the cables when they were damaged. The ship departed from a Russian port and is currently anchored in Danish waters. Authorities are investigating the incident as possible sabotage.
summary: Two undersea data cables in the Baltic Sea connecting Finland, Germany, Lithuania, and Sweden were damaged. The Danish military is investigating a Chinese ship, Yi Peng 3, that was near the cables when they were damaged. The ship departed from a Russian port and is currently anchored in Danish waters. Authorities are investigating the incident as possible sabotage.

title: Poll 'Nostradamus' loses cool after being called 'deluded': 'Don't take cheap shots at me'
content: Turkish-American commentator Cenk Uygur said Allan Lichtman's keys were wrong to which Lichtman strongly protested and said it was a cheap shot. "Well, who won brother?" Cenk Uygur said unfettered. ​"You should not be taking cheap shots at me. Don't make it personal," Lichtman said. "You live in a total world of denial," Cenk took a jibe. "You don't know know anything."
summary: Turkish-American commentator Cenk Uygur said Allan Lichtman's keys were wrong to which Lichtman strongly protested and said it was a cheap shot. "Well, who won brother?" Cenk Uygur said unfettered. ​"You should not be taking cheap shots at me. Don't make it personal," Lichtman said. "You live in a total world of denial," Cenk took a jibe. "You don't know know anything."

title: From WWE co-founder to Trump’s Secretary of Education: The meteoric rise of Linda McMahon
content: Linda McMahon co-founded WWE with her husband, Vince McMahon, transforming it into a global entertainment juggernaut. Her business acumen has been widely acknowledged, and she previously served as the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) during Trump’s presidency, where she advocated for small businesses and entrepreneurship. While her direct experience in education policy is limited, she has previously served on Connecticut’s Board of Education and as a trustee at a university. Her views on education align closely with Trump’s focus on school choice, parental rights, and a decentralized approach to education governance.
summary: Linda McMahon co-founded WWE with her husband, Vince McMahon, transforming it into a global entertainment juggernaut. Her business acumen has been widely acknowledged, and she previously served as the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) during Trump’s presidency, where she advocated for small businesses and entrepreneurship. While her direct experience in education policy is limited, she has previously served on Connecticut’s Board of Education and as a trustee at a university. Her views on education align closely with Trump’s focus on school choice, parental rights, and a decentralized approach to education governance.

title: Lawyer claims Matt Gaetz paid more than $10,000 for sex, called them 'reimbursement', 'gift'
content: ABC News reported records of several payments from Gaetz to the women between 2018 and 2019 each between $200 and $650. The notes for each payment had words like 'gifts', 'reimbursement', 'love you', 'joy' etc. Attorney Joel Leppardm representing the two women who testified before the House Ethics Committee is building pressure for the release of the investigation report against Gaetz.
summary: ABC News reported records of several payments from Gaetz to the women between 2018 and 2019 each between $200 and $650. The notes for each payment had words like 'gifts', 'reimbursement', 'love you', 'joy' etc. Attorney Joel Leppardm representing the two women who testified before the House Ethics Committee is building pressure for the release of the investigation report against Gaetz.

title: NYC stabbing spree: Three killed in 'unprovoked' attacks, suspect arrested
content: A homeless man with a history of mental illness fatally stabbed three people and injured another in a series of unprovoked attacks across Manhattan. The suspect, 51-year-old Ramon Rivera, was apprehended by police after being spotted by bystanders. The incident has sparked outrage and calls for reform of the city's criminal justice and mental health systems.
summary: A homeless man with a history of mental illness fatally stabbed three people and injured another in a series of unprovoked attacks across Manhattan. The suspect, 51-year-old Ramon Rivera, was apprehended by police after being spotted by bystanders. The incident has sparked outrage and calls for reform of the city's criminal justice and mental health systems.

title: Australians urged to catch deadly funnel-web spiders for antivenom production
content: The Australian Reptile Park is urging Sydney residents to help collect deadly funnel-web spiders during their breeding season. The venom is crucial for producing life-saving antivenom, with each vial requiring approximately 150 spiders. Public contributions are vital to replenish venom supplies as male spiders have short lifespans.
summary: The Australian Reptile Park is urging Sydney residents to help collect deadly funnel-web spiders during their breeding season. The venom is crucial for producing life-saving antivenom, with each vial requiring approximately 150 spiders. Public contributions are vital to replenish venom supplies as male spiders have short lifespans.

title: Watch: When Donald Trump took to the WWE Ring to shave Linda McMahon's husband's head
content: Former wrestling executive Linda McMahon, 76, has been appointed by President-elect Donald Trump to lead the Education Department. The appointment underscores the long-standing relationship between Trump and the McMahon family, stemming from Trump's involvement with WWE in the late 1980s.
summary: Former wrestling executive Linda McMahon, 76, has been appointed by President-elect Donald Trump to lead the Education Department. The appointment underscores the long-standing relationship between Trump and the McMahon family, stemming from Trump's involvement with WWE in the late 1980s.

title: US embassy shuts down in Kyiv over likely 'significant air attack'
content: The US Embassy in Kyiv closed its doors and instructed staff to take cover following a warning about a potential large-scale Russian air attack. The alert was issued after Ukraine used US-supplied ATACMS missiles to attack Russian territory, escalating tensions between Russia and the West.
summary: The US Embassy in Kyiv closed its doors and instructed staff to take cover following a warning about a potential large-scale Russian air attack. The alert was issued after Ukraine used US-supplied ATACMS missiles to attack Russian territory, escalating tensions between Russia and the West.

title: Heated moment when Donald Trump's new press secretary, Karoline Leavitt, was kicked out of CNN
content: At 27, Karoline Leavitt, who started with humble beginnings, has been appointed as President-elect Donald Trump's press secretary. Leavitt previously worked with Kayleigh McEnany and gained recognition for her composed demeanour during a contentious CNN interview. Just days after giving birth, she expressed her dedication by returning to work, inspired by Trump's commitment after an assassination attempt at his rally.
summary: At 27, Karoline Leavitt, who started with humble beginnings, has been appointed as President-elect Donald Trump's press secretary.  Leavitt previously worked with Kayleigh McEnany and gained recognition for her composed demeanour during a contentious CNN interview.  Just days after giving birth, she expressed her dedication by returning to work, inspired by Trump's commitment after an assassination attempt at his rally.

title: 'Government should not be in possession': Court orders destruction of Sean Diddy Combs' jail cell notes
content: During a hearing concerning R. Kelly's case, the judge ordered the prosecution to return 19 pages of the singer's handwritten notes seized from his cell. Despite being labeled as 'legal' by Kelly, the prosecution argued these notes hinted at potential witness tampering. However, the judge assured that these allegations wouldn't affect the upcoming bail decision.
summary: During a hearing concerning R. Kelly's case, the judge ordered the prosecution to return 19 pages of the singer's handwritten notes seized from his cell.  Despite being labeled as 'legal' by Kelly, the prosecution argued these notes hinted at potential witness tampering. However, the judge assured that these allegations wouldn't affect the upcoming bail decision.

title: Bomb cyclone hits northwest US, causing major disruptions; power outages affect thousands
content: A powerful storm, classified as a "bomb cyclone", has slammed the northwest US, bringing hurricane-force winds and torrential rainfall. The storm threatens widespread power outages, coastal flooding, and hazardous conditions in mountainous areas. Thousands are already without power as the region braces for the most severe atmospheric river of the season.
summary: A powerful storm, classified as a "bomb cyclone", has slammed the northwest US, bringing hurricane-force winds and torrential rainfall. The storm threatens widespread power outages, coastal flooding, and hazardous conditions in mountainous areas. Thousands are already without power as the region braces for the most severe atmospheric river of the season.
